decks.notes: The deck focuses on generating as much mana as possible through spells like Pyretic Ritual and Manamorphose to cast powerful spells such as Grapeshot and Past in Flames. Ral, Monsoon Mage and Wrenn's Resolve provide additional card advantage and control options. The combo potential of the deck lies in chaining together spells and generating a large storm count to deal massive damage to the opponent. Wish and Valakut Awakening offer versatile options for finding key pieces of the combo. The overall strategy is to efficiently build up to a powerful finish and overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to create a powerful combo that allows for significant card advantage and potential win conditions through Grinding Station. The deck includes various ways to control the game state and protect the combo pieces, as well as ways to generate mana and draw cards efficiently. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces quickly and efficiently, while disrupting the opponent's game plan and staying ahead in resources.

The deck focuses on utilizing the combo of Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to continuously loop spells and artifacts from the graveyard to generate infinite mill and damage. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble provide additional value and card advantage, while Urza's Saga helps find key pieces of the combo. The deck also includes disruption and protection in the form of counterspells like Spell Snare and Spell Pierce, as well as removal like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Soul-Guide Lantern offer additional utility and graveyard hate.

This deck focuses on disrupting opponents' strategies and controlling the board with removal spells and creature abilities. It also aims to generate value by blinking creatures like Flickerwisp and Ephemerate. Relic of Progenitus helps to disrupt graveyard strategies, while Thoughtseize provides hand disruption. The creatures in the deck have powerful abilities that can swing the game in your favor, such as generating tokens or gaining life. The mana base includes a mix of lands to support the deck's colors and to ensure consistent mana production.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and burning the opponent with direct damage spells. It aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures like Territorial Kavu and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, while also using powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames to finish off the opponent. The Leyline cards provide additional support by boosting the deck's creatures and protecting them from removal spells. The deck's mana base is built to support a wide range of colors to ensure it can consistently cast its spells and aggressive creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Underworld Breach with various artifacts and graveyard recursion cards to generate powerful and explosive plays. By leveraging cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Mishra's Bauble, and Mox Opal in combination with Urza's Saga and Grinding Station, the deck aims to assemble win conditions such as Thassa's Oracle or Malevolent Rumble to secure the victory. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Swan Song and Unholy Heat to interact with opponents and protect its game plan.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board by utilizing a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while efficiently dealing with threats on the board. By efficiently controlling the game, the deck seeks to out-value the opponent by utilizing powerful card advantage engines such as Murktide Regent and Psychic Frog. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Subtlety to deal with problematic creatures. Additionally, it includes cards like Cling to Dust to manage the graveyard and ensure card advantage.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while quickly building up a board presence through aggressive creatures. By using cards like Thoughtseize and Relic of Progenitus to disrupt the opponent's hand and graveyard, while also using removal spells like Fatal Push and Prismatic Ending to deal with threats, this deck aims to control the game tempo. The creatures in this deck, such as Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Ketramose, the New Dawn, are powerful threats that can quickly close out the game if left unchecked. The deck also utilizes flicker effects like Flickerwisp and Ephemerate to reuse powerful ETB abilities and generate card advantage.

This Eldrazi Ramp deck focuses on accelerating mana with cards like Eldrazi Temple, Utopia Sprawl, and Talisman of Impulse to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Breaker of Creation. The deck also includes control elements like Karn, the Great Creator, Kozilek's Return, and All Is Dust to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command provide additional removal options, while Ancient Stirrings helps to find key pieces of the deck. Ugin's Labyrinth further enhances the control aspect of the deck, creating a challenging board state for the opponent.

This deck focuses on using the combo potential of Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to repeatedly mill cards from the library and win the game with Thassa's Oracle. The deck also includes different ways to fuel the combo with cards like Emry, Mishra's Bauble, and Mox Opal, while also having disruption and control elements with cards like Spell Pierce and Unholy Heat. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful and efficient win condition.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to continuously cast cards from the graveyard and generate a powerful advantage. By combining cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student with Mox Opal and other zero cost artifacts, the deck aims to create a loop of card draw and mana production. The goal is to eventually win the game by casting Thassa's Oracle with a near empty library, ensuring victory through the combo engine's efficiency and synergy.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifacts to build a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining artifact creatures with powerful artifact synergy cards, the goal is to outpace and outvalue the opponent, utilizing cards like Urza's Saga and Emry, Lurker of the Loch to generate additional resources and threats. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Thoughtcast provide card advantage and selection, while cards like Mishra's Bauble and Portable Hole help disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to be fast, efficient, and proactive in its strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly cycling through cards to fill the graveyard with creatures, then casting Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield for a powerful combo finish. It also includes cards like Force of Negation and Sink into Stupor to control the opponent's actions and ensure the combo can go off smoothly. The creatures in the deck have abilities that benefit from being discarded or entering the battlefield from the graveyard, creating a synergistic strategy that can overwhelm opponents with a large board presence in a short amount of time.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful early creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer, supported by efficient removal spells like Galvanic Discharge. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent with a steady stream of threats while disrupting their game plan with cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Static Prison. With cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah providing additional damage and resilience, the deck looks to close out the game swiftly before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing lands like Simic Growth Chamber and Urza's Saga with Amulet of Vigor to generate mana quickly and tutor for key cards like Primeval Titan. It also includes cards like Scapeshift and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to deal damage to the opponent and close out the game. The deck relies on assembling specific land combinations and utilizing the synergy between lands and creatures to create explosive plays and win the game quickly. Additionally, it includes cards like Summoner's Pact and Explore to help find and play key pieces of the combo.

The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach along with various artifacts and spells to create a powerful combo that allows for repeated casting of spells from the graveyard. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide additional card advantage and recursion, while Grinding Station serves as a win condition by milling the opponent's library. Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal enable fast mana generation, while Malevolent Rumble and Lightning Bolt provide disruption and removal. Thassa's Oracle acts as a backup win condition to secure the victory.
